tech_news:
• [Nov 25, 2025, 12:59 PM] Topic: A new malware campaign is using ClickFix lures and fake adult websites to trick users into downloading malicious software.
  • [Nov 25, 2025, 1:59 AM] Topic: Cisco has released patches for a critical security vulnerability in its Secure Client software that could allow for arbitrary code execution.
  • [Nov 23, 2025, 9:00 AM] Topic: WhatsApp has acknowledged a vulnerability in its messaging apps for Apple iOS and macOS (CVE-2025-55177) that has been chained with other exploits.
  • [Nov 21, 2025, 9:00 AM] Topic: Google announced an update to its Quick Share feature, enabling file transfers between Android and Apple devices.
  • [Nov 19, 2025, 9:00 AM] Topic: Cybersecurity researchers have uncovered a new cryptojacking campaign targeting publicly accessible DevOps web servers.
  • [Nov 18, 2025, 9:00 AM] Topic: Fortinet has warned customers of a critical vulnerability in FortiSIEM (CVE-2025-25256) with exploit code available in the wild.
  • [Nov 24, 2025, 9:00 AM] Topic: Leica's new M EV1 rangefinder-less camera has cleared the FCC and is now available in the US.
  • [Nov 20, 2025, 9:00 AM] Topic: A Russian humanoid robot had an unsuccessful stage debut, falling flat on its face before being removed.
  • [Nov 20, 2025, 9:00 AM] Topic: The developers of Vampire Survivors have announced a new roguelike deckbuilder game called Vampire Crawlers: The Turbo Wildcard, scheduled for release next year.
  • [Nov 18, 2025, 9:00 AM] Topic: A new US policy initiative aims to accelerate scientific breakthroughs to address the rising energy demands from AI and other technologies.
financial_news:
• [Nov 24, 2025] High-Yield Savings Accounts: A report on the best high-yield savings accounts for November 2025 was released, noting that some federally insured institutions are offering up to 4.20% APY, providing a safe haven for investors seeking returns amid market volatility.
  • [Nov 21, 2025] ECB Policy: Top European Central Bank officials, including President Christine Lagarde, urged the European Union to remove internal trade barriers to offset the economic impact of potential U.S. trade tariffs and deglobalization. The statements were made during Euro Finance Week in Frankfurt.
  • [Nov 17, 2025, 9:31 AM PST] UK Market Close: London's FTSE 100 index closed lower, dragged down by financial stocks as investors prepared for a week of significant economic data releases. Healthcare and utilities stocks saw modest gains, but they were not enough to lift the broader market.
  • [Nov 14, 2025] U.S. Economic Policy: U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent delivered remarks at the Economic Club of New York, outlining the Treasury Department's priorities and its role in the President's 'America First' agenda. He emphasized the administration's focus on improving the lives of all Americans.
conspiracies:
• [Nov 24, 6:08 PM] Theory: A conspiracy theory is trending on X (formerly Twitter) that actor Timoth√©e Chalamet is secretly Liverpool rapper EsDeeKid. Proponents of the theory point to Chalamet's known interest in rap music and his recent attendance at a Liverpool soccer match as evidence.
  • [Nov 21, 4:12 PM] Theory: Shane Dawson released the second part of his new conspiracy theory video series on YouTube, which has generated significant discussion on X (formerly Twitter).
  • [Nov 18, 5:13 PM] Theory: Shane Dawson's return to posting conspiracy theory videos on his main YouTube channel has sparked renewed interest and discussion on X (formerly Twitter) and other social media platforms.
